name: paper-slider

events.name: core-change
events.description: Fired when the slider's value changes.

events.name: immediate-value-change
events.description: Fired when the slider's immediateValue changes.

events.name: change
events.description:
Fired when the slider's value changes due to user interaction.

Changes to the slider's value due to changes in an underlying
bound variable will not trigger this event.

attributes.name: snaps
attributes.description:
If true, the slider thumb snaps to tick marks evenly spaced based
on the `step` property value.

attributes.name: pin
attributes.description:
If true, a pin with numeric value label is shown when the slider thumb 
is pressed.  Use for settings for which users need to know the exact 
value of the setting.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description:
If true, this slider is disabled.  A disabled slider cannot be tapped
or dragged to change the slider value.

attributes.name: secondaryProgress
attributes.description: The number that represents the current secondary progress.

attributes.name: editable
attributes.description: If true, an input is shown and user can use it to set the slider value.

attributes.name: immediateValue
attributes.description:
The immediate value of the slider.  This value is updated while the user
is dragging the slider.

attributes.name: dragging
attributes.description: True when the user is dragging the slider.

methods.name: increment
methods.description: Increases value by `step` but not above `max`.

methods.name: decrement
methods.description: Decreases value by `step` but not below `min`.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The number that represents the current value.

attributes.name: min
attributes.description: The number that indicates the minimum value of the range.

attributes.name: max
attributes.description: The number that indicates the maximum value of the range.

attributes.name: step
attributes.description: Specifies the value granularity of the range's value.

attributes.name: ratio
attributes.description: Returns the ratio of the value.
